name: God of Skate
description:
Are you bored waiting for God of War Ragnarok?

Me too, in the meantime you can play my game "God of Skate" a mix of God of War and Tony Hawks Pro Skater.

This is an experimental game, don't expect a finished game, my purpose is to learn Unity (the game engine) and remember the good times playing Tony Hawks Pro Skater.

The mission of this game is to destroy 5 greek vases of 3 levels, also you can spend time doing some tricks without killing yourself and play with the photo mode.

Controls

Pause = ESC, PS Options
Jump = Space, PS Square
Do a trick on  air = F, PS X
Set target = P, PS L1
Shoot = SPACE, PS Square

Change settingsChange music = M, PS R1
Change Camera angle = C, PS Triangle
Change sky = O , PS L2
Hide/Show HUD = H, PS R2

Photo mode

* Controller is required

Enable/Disable photo mode = R, PS Circle
Horizontal Joystick = Move horizontally
Vertical Joystic = Move vertically

3D Models

Kratos - Alex Dupuis
Skate - Tiago Lopes
Skatepark - Level 1 - coralclimb
Skatepark - Level 2 - Jacky Heshi
Skatepark - Level 3 - jrmasiero

Donate

Consider to donate so I can spend money on assets and make more games like this.
